title: Stanley, Falkland Islands
summary: Stanley (/ˈstænli/; also known as Port Stanley) is the capital of the Falkland Islands. It is located on the island of East Falkland, on a north-facing slope in one of the wettest parts of the islands. At the 2016 census, the town had a population of 2,460.[1] The entire population of the Falkland Islands was 3,398 on Census Day on 9 October 2016.
